channel.title: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsBoundsException: 65535 HELP!
channel.description:
What is animation 65535 & how can I fix this error?
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65535 at client.method101(client.java:8025) at client.method96(client.java:7794) at client.method95(client.java:7760) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3114) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2266) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsBoundsException: 65535 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Wintercanon:

I’m guessing that the array of animations held in the client doesn’t go to 65535? You must be trying to use an animation server-side that isn’t compatible with that client.

You are right, however; i recieved this error from SWAT’s 525 animation/graphic tutorial. So i just did the tutorial over again on a new client and used my server with it.

No more help needed!

Read full topic
